p: The study area comprises four states, namely, Kwara (Omu Aran), Oyo (Ogbomoso), Ekiti (Ado Ekiti), and Ogun (Sagamu) in Nigeria located on 8°08′N (5°06′E), 8°08′N (4°15′E), 7°37′16″N (5°13′17″E), and 6°50′N (3°39′E), respectively. The study areas are located in two important geopolitical zones, that is, Omu Aran (North central), Ogbomoso, Sagamu, and Ado Ekiti (Southwest) of Nigeria ( Figure 1) The inhabitants are majorly from the Yoruba ethnic group. The study area falls into the category of state with most prevalence of malaria in Nigeria according to MIS report.
